title: Can I feed a relatives pet or a stray animal? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Sadman from Bangladesh Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Sheikh, there is a cat that belongs to our relatives residing in almost the same place and the cat sometimes visits near our house, so can I give it food? Although it belongs to other person Is the food Halal? Yes, Halal Why would you not give a stray animal or an animal of your neighbor who comes to you and does not have any signs of saying that it is gluten intolerance or any of the likes? You can give any animal, whether it belongs to your relative, to your neighbors, or doesn't belong to anyone, you can give it food, water, and whatever you wish For more information visit www.osho.com
